description.english: You opened your door, not sure where to put the first thing
description.schinese: 你推开属于自己的门，还没想好第一件东西该放哪
description.japanese: 自分のドアを開けたけれど、最初のアイテムをどこに置くか、まだ決められないみたい
description.tchinese: 你推開屬於自己的門，還沒想好第一件東西該放哪
description.german: Du hast deine Tür aufgemacht, weißt aber nicht, wohin du das Erste stellen sollst.
description.french: Tu ouvres ta porte, sans savoir où poser le premier objet.
description.koreana: 나만의 문을 열었으나, 첫 번째 물건을 어디에 둬야 할지 아직 결정하지 못했다.
description.spanish: Empujaste la puerta, sin decidir dónde colocar la primera cosa
description.brazilian: Você abriu a própria porta, sem saber onde colocar a primeira coisa

description.english: You teamed up with a pup for your first job
description.schinese: 你的第一份工作，居然和小狗搭档
description.japanese: 初めての仕事で、まさか小さな犬とペアになるとは
description.tchinese: 你的第一份工作，居然和小狗搭檔
description.german: Du hast dich für deinen ersten Job mit einem Welpen zusammengetan.
description.french: Ta première mission t’a fait collaborer avec un chien.
description.koreana: 나의 첫 번째 직업이 강아지와의 파트너였다.
description.spanish: Tu primer trabajo resulta ser junto a un cachorro
description.brazilian: Seu primeiro trabalho foi ao lado de um cachorrinho

description.english: You served cake, but avoided the bedroom’s memories
description.schinese: 你端出一块蛋糕，不愿提起卧室里还有他的痕迹
description.japanese: ケーキを差し出したけど、寝室にまだ彼の痕跡が残っていることには、触れたくない
description.tchinese: 你端出一塊蛋糕，不願提起臥室裡還有他的痕跡
description.german: Du hast einen Kuchen rausgebracht, aber die Erinnerungen im Schlafzimmer gemieden.
description.french: Tu sers un gâteau, mais évites les souvenirs laissés dans la chambre.
description.koreana: 케이크 한 조각을 내왔으나, 침실에 남은 그의 흔적에 대해 말하기 싫었다.
description.spanish: Serviste un pastel, sin querer mencionar las memorias del dormitorio
description.brazilian: Você serviu um pedaço de bolo e evitou o quarto onde ainda restavam memórias dele

description.english: You got lost in ancient herbs and took a lonely path
description.schinese: 你沉迷于古老的草药，走上无人能及的道路
description.japanese: 古い薬草に夢中になり、誰も追いつけない道を歩み始める
description.tchinese: 你沉迷於古老的草藥，走上無人能及的道路
description.german: Du hast dich in alten Kräutern verirrt und bist einen einsamen Weg gegangen.
description.french: Fasciné par les herbes anciennes, tu empruntes une voie unique.
description.koreana: 오래된 약초에 심취하여 아무도 가지 못한 길을 걸었다.
description.spanish: Te perdiste en las hierbas antiguas y emprendiste un camino que nadie más podía seguir
description.brazilian: Você se perdeu em ervas antigas e seguiu por um caminho solitário

description.english: You stepped into the unknown, luckily the client knew better
description.schinese: 你踏入了完全未知的领域，还好客户比你更懂行
description.japanese: 完全に未知の世界に足を踏み入れたが、幸いに客のほうが詳しかった
description.tchinese: 你踏入了完全未知的領域，還好客戶比你更懂行
description.german: Du bist ins Ungewisse getreten – zum Glück wusste der Kunde es besser.
description.french: Tu explores l’inconnu, heureusement le client connaît mieux.
description.koreana: 완전히 미지의 영역에 발을 들였으나, 다행히 고객이 나보다 더 전문가였다.
description.spanish: Entraste en un campo completamente desconocido, por suerte el cliente sabe más que tú
description.brazilian: Você entrou em um território totalmente desconhecido, ainda bem que o cliente sabia mais

description.english: You are finally free to design the room you want
description.schinese: 你终于自由，能随心所欲设计理想的房间
description.japanese: ついに自由になり、理想の部屋を思うままにデザインできるようになった
description.tchinese: 你終於自由，能隨心所欲設計理想的房間
description.german: Du bist endlich frei und kannst dein Traumzimmer ganz nach deinen Wünschen gestalten!
description.french: Enfin libre, tu crées la pièce de tes rêves.
description.koreana: 마침내 마음껏 이상적인 방을 설계할 수 있게 되었다.
description.spanish: Por fin puedes diseñar la sala ideal a tu gusto
description.brazilian: Você finalmente está livre para criar o quarto dos seus sonhos

description.english: You saw cats everywhere you went
description.schinese: 你走到哪都能看见猫
description.japanese: どこへ行っても、猫の姿が見える
description.tchinese: 你走到哪都能看見貓
description.german: Überall, wo du hingehst, siehst du Katzen.
description.french: Partout où tu vas, des chats te suivent.
description.koreana: 내가 가는 곳마다 고양이를 볼 수 있었다.
description.spanish: ¡Ya estás rodeado de gatitos!
description.brazilian: Onde quer que fosse, sempre havia gatos

description.english: You bravely cleared the water plants in the cabin
description.schinese: 你勇敢地把小屋里的水草全收拾了
description.japanese: 小屋の水草を、勇気を出してすべて片付けた
description.tchinese: 你勇敢地把小屋裡的水草全收拾了
description.german: Du hast ganz mutig alle Wasserpflanzen in der Hütte aufgeräumt.
description.french: Tu as courageusement nettoyé toutes les plantes aquatiques de la cabane.
description.koreana: 용감하게 오두막 안의 물풀을 모두 정리했다.
description.spanish: ¡Bravo! Limpiaste todas las plantas acuáticas de la cabaña
description.brazilian: Você teve coragem de limpar todas as plantas aquáticas da cabana

description.english: You gave them a little more warm time
description.schinese: 你让他们得到了更多温暖时光
description.japanese: 彼らに、より多くの温かい時間を届けた
description.tchinese: 你讓他們得到了更多溫暖時光
description.german: Du hast ihnen mehr warme Zeit beschert.
description.french: Tu prolonges leurs moments chaleureux.
description.koreana: 그들이 더 많은 따뜻한 시간을 갖도록 만들었다.
description.spanish: Les diste más momentos cálidos
description.brazilian: Você lhes deu um pouco mais de tempo acolhedor

displayName.spanish: Rescate en el Mar de Papel

description.english: You rescued a teacup out of the paper sea—no time to sip
description.schinese: 你捞出了文件海中的茶杯，显然没空喝
description.japanese: 書類の海からティーカップを救い出したが、どうやら飲む時間はなさそうだ
description.tchinese: 你撈出了文件海中的茶杯，顯然沒空喝
description.german: Du hast eine Teetasse aus dem Papiermeer gerettet – keine Zeit zum Schlürfen!
description.french: Tu récupères une tasse au milieu de la mer de dossiers, pas le temps de siroter.
description.koreana: 문서 더미 속에서 찻잔을 건져냈으나, 마실 시간은 없었다.
description.spanish: Rescataste una taza de té del mar de papeles, pero ni siquiera tuviste tiempo para un sorbo
description.brazilian: Você resgatou uma xícara de chá do mar de papéis, sem tempo para beber

description.english: You placed the last flowerpot, and fragrance spilled from your hands
description.schinese: 你放下最后一个花盆，芬芳从指缝间溢出
description.japanese: 最後の鉢を置くと、指の間から香りが溢れ出した
description.tchinese: 你放下最後一個花盆，芬芳從指縫間溢出
description.german: Du hast den letzten Blumentopf platziert, und der Duft ist dir aus den Händen geglitten.
description.french: Tu poses le dernier pot, le parfum s’échappe entre tes doigts.
description.koreana: 마지막 화분을 내려놓자, 손가락 사이로 향기가 흘러넘쳤다.
description.spanish: Colocaste la última maceta, y la fragancia se derramó de las manos
description.brazilian: Você colocou o último vaso e o perfume escapou por entre os dedos

description.english: You said goodbye to one who wrote kindness with harsh words
description.schinese: 你送别了一位用苛严写善书的人
description.japanese: 厳しさ以て善行を書き記す人を見送った
description.tchinese: 你送別了一位用苛嚴寫善書的人
description.german: Du hast dich von jemandem verabschiedet, der Freundlichkeit mit harten Worten geschrieben hat.
description.french: Tu dis au revoir à celui qui écrivait la bonté avec rigueur.
description.koreana: 혹독함으로 좋은 글을 쓰는 사람을 배웅했다.
description.spanish: Te despediste de la persona que escribía la bondad con palabras severas
description.brazilian: Você se despediu de alguém que escrevia bondade com palavras duras

description.english: You stayed in the graveyard, spirits around you, no longer alone
description.schinese: 你停驻在墓地，幽影缠绕，你不再孤单
description.japanese: 墓地に立ち止まり、幽霊の影に包まれ、もう孤独ではない
description.tchinese: 你停駐在墓地，幽影纏繞，你不再孤單
description.german: Du bist auf dem Friedhof geblieben, geisterhafte Schatten umschlingen dich – du bist nicht mehr allein.
description.french: Tu t’arrêtes au cimetière, les esprits t’entourent, tu n’es plus seul.
description.koreana: 묘지에 멈춰 서자, 유령 그림자가 휘감아 더 이상 외롭지 않았다.
description.spanish: Con los espíritus a tu alrededor en el cementerio, ya no te sientes solo
description.brazilian: Você permaneceu no cemitério, cercado por sombras, mas não mais sozinho

description.english: You stayed up all night gaming with your bestie
description.schinese: 你约上闺蜜通宵打游戏
description.japanese: 親友を誘って、夜通しゲームをした
description.tchinese: 你約上閨蜜通宵打遊戲
description.german: Du hast die ganze Nacht mit deinem Kumpel gezockt.
description.french: Une nuit entière de jeu avec ta meilleure amie.
description.koreana: 가장 친한 친구를 불러 밤새 게임을 했다.
description.spanish: Quedaste con tu bestie para jugar videojuegos toda la noche
description.brazilian: Você virou a noite jogando com sua melhor amiga

description.english: You found the summer of your childhood
description.schinese: 你找到了小时候的夏天
description.japanese: 子供の頃の夏を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了小時候的夏天
description.german: Du hast den Sommer deiner Kindheit gefunden.
description.french: Tu retrouves l’été de ton enfance.
description.koreana: 어릴 적의 여름을 찾아냈다.
description.spanish: Encontraste el verano de tu infancia
description.brazilian: Você reencontrou o verão da infância

description.english: You let customers see exactly what they wanted
description.schinese: 你让上帝们一眼看到了自己想要的东西
description.japanese: 神様たちに、欲しいものを一目で見せた
description.tchinese: 你讓上帝們一眼看到了自己想要的東西
description.german: Du lässt die Kunden genau das sehen, was sie wollen.
description.french: Tout est si bien arrangé que chacun trouve ce qu’il cherche.
description.koreana: 고객들이 원하는 것을 한눈에 볼 수 있게 만들었다.
description.spanish: Hiciste que los clientes vieran exactamente lo que querían tomar
description.brazilian: Você mostrou aos clientes exatamente o que eles queriam ver

description.english: You copyed the shop multiply across town
description.schinese: 你让商店在小镇复制生长
description.japanese: 商店を町中に次々とオーブンさせた
description.tchinese: 你讓商店在小鎮複製生長
description.german: Du lässt den Laden im kleinen Dorf nachwachsen.
description.french: Tu reproduis la boutique à travers tout le village.
description.koreana: 상점이 마을에 불어나게 했다.
description.spanish: Hiciste que la tienda se multiplicara por todo el pueblo
description.brazilian: Você fez as lojas se espalharem pela cidade

description.english: You whispered secrets to a friend under dim lights
description.schinese: 你在暧昧的灯光下向好友吐露秘密
description.japanese: 曖昧な灯りの下、親友に秘密を打ち明けた
description.tchinese: 你在曖昧的燈光下向好友吐露秘密
description.german: Du hast einem Freund im gedämpften Licht Geheimnisse zugeflüstert.
description.french: Sous les lumières tamisées, tu confies tes secrets à ton amie.
description.koreana: 미묘한 분위기의 등불 아래서 친구에게 비밀을 털어놓았다.
description.spanish: Los secretos se susurraron entre amigos bajo la luz tenue
description.brazilian: Sob luzes suaves, você confidenciou segredos a um amigo

description.english: You successfully grew plants, but none are edible
description.schinese: 你成功种出了植物，可惜不能吃
description.japanese: 植物を見事に育てたが、残念ながら食べられないけど
description.tchinese: 你成功種出了植物，可惜不能吃
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich Pflanzen angebaut, aber keine davon ist essbar.
description.french: Tes plantes ont poussé… mais elles ne sont pas comestibles.
description.koreana: 식물 재배에 성공했으나, 아쉽게도 먹을 수는 없었다.
description.spanish: Cultivaste plantas con éxito, pero ninguna es comestible
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu cultivar plantas, mas nenhuma delas era comestível

description.english: You crafted your first item with alchemy—100% original
description.schinese: 你使用炼金术合成了第一个物品，百分百原创
description.japanese: 錬金術で初めてのアイテムを合成した、完全オリジナルだ
description.tchinese: 你使用煉金術合成了第一個物品，百分百原創
description.german: Du hast mit Alchemie deinen ersten Gegenstand zusammengemischt – zu 100 % einzigartig!
description.french: Tu crées ton premier objet grâce à l’alchimie, totalement original.
description.koreana: 연금술로 첫 번째 물품을 100% 오리지널로 합성했다.
description.spanish: Creaste tu primer objeto con alquimia, ¡100% original!
description.brazilian: Você criou o primeiro item com alquimia, totalmente original

description.english: You proved that water is endless
description.schinese: 你用行动证明，水资源是无限的
description.japanese: 行動で、水資源は無限だと証明した
description.tchinese: 你用行動證明，水資源是無限的
description.german: Du hast bewiesen, dass Wasserressourcen unendlich sind.
description.french: Tu démontres que les ressources sont inépuisables.
description.koreana: 물은 무한하다는 것을 행동으로 증명했다.
description.spanish: Demostraste que el agua es infinita
description.brazilian: Você provou com ações que a água é infinita

description.english: You owned another home with even more space
description.schinese: 你拥有了另一个属于自己的家，空间更大
description.japanese: もう一つ、自分だけの家を手に入れた、より広い空間だ
description.tchinese: 你擁有了另一個屬於自己的家，空間更大
description.german: Du hast ein neues Zuhause für dich – mit noch mehr Platz!
description.french: Tu gagnes un nouveau foyer, plus grand et plus libre.
description.koreana: 더 넓은 공간의 또 다른 나의 집을 갖게 되었다.
description.spanish: Obtuviste otra casa propia con más espacio
description.brazilian: Você ganhou outro lar, maior e mais espaçoso

description.english: You fixed that wall, and a ghost’s heart lit up
description.schinese: 你把那面墙拼好，幽灵的心也随之亮起一小盏灯
description.japanese: 壁を組み上げると、幽霊の心にもぽっと灯りがともった
description.tchinese: 你把那面牆拼好，幽靈的心也隨之亮起一小盞燈
description.german: Du hast die Wand repariert, und das Herz des Geistes ist aufgeleuchtet.
description.french: Le mur reconstruit, le cœur d’un fantôme s’illumine.
description.koreana: 그 벽을 완성하자, 유령의 마음에도 작은 등불 하나가 켜졌다.
description.spanish: Arreglaste esa pared, y el corazón de un fantasma se iluminó
description.brazilian: Você consertou a parede, e uma pequena luz se acendeu no coração do fantasma

description.english: You opened the oven, and butter filled the room
description.schinese: 你拉开烤炉，房间里多了一点黄油香气
description.japanese: オーブンを開けると、部屋にほんのりバターの香りが広がった
description.tchinese: 你拉開烤爐，房間裡多了一點黃油香氣
description.german: Du hast den Ofen aufgemacht und der Duft der Butter hat den Raum gefüllt.
description.french: Tu ouvres le four, la pièce embaume le beurre.
description.koreana: 오븐을 열자, 방 안에 버터 향기가 은은하게 퍼졌다.
description.spanish: Abriste el horno, y el aroma a mantequilla llenó la habitación
description.brazilian: Você abriu o forno, e o quarto se encheu com o aroma de manteiga

description.english: You snagged a smart egg from another world
description.schinese: 你搞到了异世界的聪明蛋
description.japanese: 異世界の賢い卵を手に入れた
description.tchinese: 你搞到了異世界的聰明蛋
description.german: Du hast ein schlaues Ei aus einer anderen Welt abgegriffen.
description.french: Un œuf astucieux d’un autre univers te rejoint.
description.koreana: 이세계에서 온 똑똑한 알을 손에 넣었다.
description.spanish: Conseguiste un huevo inteligente de otro mundo
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu um ovo inteligente de outro mundo

description.english: You found a place to rest
description.schinese: 你找到了一个歇脚的地方
description.japanese: ひと休みできる場所を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一個歇腳的地方
description.german: Du hast einen Platz zum Ausruhen gefunden.
description.french: Tu trouves un endroit pour souffler un peu.
description.koreana: 잠시 발을 쉴 곳을 찾아냈다.
description.spanish: Encontraste un lugar para descansar
description.brazilian: Você encontrou um lugar para descansar

description.english: You opened the haunted house, and her prank was finally answered
description.schinese: 你推开鬼屋的门，她的恶作剧终于有人回应
description.japanese: お化け屋敷のドアを押すと、彼女の悪戯がようやく応えられた
description.tchinese: 你推開鬼屋的門，她的惡作劇終於有人回應
description.german: Du hast das Spukhaus geöffnet, und ihr Streich wurde endlich erwidert.
description.french: La maison hantée s’ouvre, son prank enfin remarqué.
description.koreana: 귀신의 집 문을 밀고 들어가자, 그녀의 장난이 드디어 빛을 발했다.
description.spanish: Entraste en la casa encantada, y su travesura por fin recibió una respuesta
description.brazilian: Você abriu a porta da casa mal-assombrada, e a travessura dela finalmente teve resposta

displayName.japanese: 古いページに新しい跡

description.english: You dug up your old doodle book and drew new lines
description.schinese: 你翻出儿时的涂鸦本，在空白处留下了新的线条
description.japanese: 子供の頃の落書き帳をめくり、空白に新たな線を描き加えた
description.tchinese: 你翻出兒時的塗鴉本，在空白處留下了新的線條
description.german: Du kramst dein altes Kritzelheft aus der Kindheit raus und hinterlässt neue Linien auf den leeren Seiten.
description.french: Les dessins d’enfant accueillent un nouveau trait.
description.koreana: 어릴 적 낙서장을 뒤적여 빈 공간에 새로운 선을 남겼다.
description.spanish: Desenterraste tu cuaderno de garabatos de la infancia y dejaste nuevas líneas
description.brazilian: Você reencontrou o caderno de rabiscos da infância e deixou novas marcas

description.english: You skipped the card game and turned mahjong into something new
description.schinese: 你没组牌局，而是让麻将变成了另一种游戏
description.japanese: 麻雀を組まず、別のゲームに変えてみせた
description.tchinese: 你沒組牌局，而是讓麻將變成了另一種遊戲
description.german: Du hast das Kartenspiel ausgelassen und Mahjong in etwas Neues verwandelt.
description.french: Tu transformes le mahjong en une nouvelle expérience.
description.koreana: 화투판을 벌이는 대신, 마작을 또 다른 게임으로 만들었다.
description.spanish: Convertiste el mahjong en otro juego
description.brazilian: Você não jogou cartas, transformou o mahjong em outro tipo de jogo

description.english: You grew stranger flowers, each with impossible shapes
description.schinese: 你种出了更多植物，每一朵花都有不可思议的形态
description.japanese: さらに多くの植物を育て、どの花も不思議な形をしていた
description.tchinese: 你種出了更多植物，每一朵花都有不可思議的形態
description.german: Du hast noch mehr Pflanzen gezüchtet, und jede Blume hat eine unglaubliche Form.
description.french: Des fleurs inédites émergent sous tes soins.
description.koreana: 더 많은 식물을 키워냈고, 모든 꽃이 놀라운 형태를 지니게 되었다.
description.spanish: Cultivaste más flores, cada una con forma increíble
description.brazilian: Você cultivou ainda mais plantas, cada flor com uma forma impossível

displayName.spanish: El Gato Fuera de la Ventana

description.english: You closed the window—Grandma didn’t want to share GD Boys videos with the cat
description.schinese: 你关上了窗，老奶奶不想和猫分享少年团的视频
description.japanese: 窓を閉める、おばあちゃんは少年団の動画を猫とシェアしたくなかった
description.tchinese: 你關上了窗，老奶奶不想和貓分享少年團的影片
description.german: Du hast das Fenster zugemacht – Oma wollte GD-Boys-Videos nicht mit der Katze teilen.
description.french: Tu fermes la fenêtre, Mamie ne veut pas partager les vidéos des garçons avec le chat.
description.koreana: 창문을 닫았고, 할머니는 소년단 영상을 고양이와 공유하고 싶지 않았다.
description.spanish: Cerraste la ventana, porque la abuela no quería compartir los videos de GD Boys con el gato
description.brazilian: Você fechou a janela, a vovó não queria dividir os vídeos do grupo idol com o gato

description.english: You remembered the imaginary friends from your childhood
description.schinese: 你记起来了童年回忆里的幻想伙伴
description.japanese: 子供の頃に思い描いた幻想の友達を思い出した
description.tchinese: 你記起來了童年回憶裡的幻想夥伴
description.german: Du hast dich an deine imaginären Freunde aus der Kindheit erinnert.
description.french: Les compagnons imaginaires de ton enfance te reviennent.
description.koreana: 어릴 적 추억 속 환상의 친구를 기억해 냈다.
description.spanish: Recordaste a los amigos imaginarios de tu infancia
description.brazilian: Você se lembrou dos amigos imaginários da infância

description.english: You touched the higher dimension, and he came through… to cook
description.schinese: 你触及高维世界，他穿越时空而来……说要做饭
description.japanese: 高次元の世界に触れると、彼は時空を越えてやってきた……料理を作ると言って
description.tchinese: 你觸及高維世界，他穿越時空而來……說要做飯
description.german: Du hast die höhere Dimensionswelt berührt, und er ist durchgekommen … um zu kochen.
description.french: Tu touches le monde supérieur, et il apparaît… pour cuisiner.
description.koreana: 고차원 세계에 닿자, 그가 시공을 넘어 왔으며…… 요리를 하겠다고 말했다.
description.spanish: Tocaste la dimensión superior, y él vino a través del tiempo para... cocinar
description.brazilian: Você tocou o mundo de alta dimensão, e ele atravessou o tempo… para cozinhar

description.english: You stepped through the mirror and broke into his lab
description.schinese: 你穿过那面镜子，闯入了他的实验室
description.japanese: その鏡をくぐり抜け、彼の実験室に侵入した
description.tchinese: 你穿過那面鏡子，闖入了他的實驗室
description.german: Du bist durch den Spiegel getreten und hast in seinem Labor eingebrochen.
description.french: Tu passes à travers le miroir et pénètres dans son labo.
description.koreana: 거울을 통과하여 그의 실험실에 침입했다.
description.spanish: Atravesaste ese espejo e irrumpiste en su laboratorio
description.brazilian: Você atravessou o espelho e invadiu o laboratório dele

description.english: You finally fixed it and reached the Genesis Terminal
description.schinese: 你终于修好了它，进入了创世终端
description.japanese: ついにそれを修復し、創世ターミナルへと入った
description.tchinese: 你終於修好了它，進入了創世終端
description.german: Du hast es endlich repariert und das Genesis-Terminal erreicht.
description.french: Tu l’as enfin réparé et atteins le Terminal de la Création.
description.koreana: 마침내 그것을 수리하여 창세 터미널에 들어갔다.
description.spanish: Por fin lo reparaste y llegaste al Terminal Génesis
description.brazilian: Você finalmente consertou tudo e chegou ao Terminal da Criação

description.english: You just got started, a little clumsy still
description.schinese: 你刚刚上路，还带着点手忙脚乱
description.japanese: 旅立ったばかりで、まだ少し慌てている
description.tchinese: 你剛剛上路，還帶著點手忙腳亂
description.german: Du bist gerade erst losgefahren und wirkst noch ein bisschen überfordert.
description.french: Tu débutes, un peu maladroit encore.
description.koreana: 이제 막 시작해서 아직 좀 서툴다.
description.spanish: Acabas de empezar, y todavía estás un poco torpe
description.brazilian: Você acabou de começar, ainda meio atrapalhado

description.english: You found order in the chaos
description.schinese: 你现在能在混乱之间找到条理
description.japanese: 今や混乱の中でも秩序を見出せる
description.tchinese: 你現在能在混亂之間找到條理
description.german: Du hast Ordnung im Chaos gefunden.
description.french: Tu trouves de l’ordre dans le chaos.
description.koreana: 이제 혼란 속에서도 질서를 찾을 수 있게 되었다.
description.spanish: Ahora puedes encontrar el orden en medio del caos
description.brazilian: Agora você consegue encontrar ordem no meio do caos

description.english: You caught the rhythm, and the room listened
description.schinese: 你渐渐掌握节奏，房间开始乖乖听话
description.japanese: 少しずつリズムを掴み、部屋がおとなしく従った
description.tchinese: 你漸漸掌握節奏，房間開始乖乖聽話
description.german: Du hast den Rhythmus getroffen, und der Raum hörte zu.
description.french: Les pièces obéissent à ton tempo.
description.koreana: 점차 리듬을 익히니 방이 순순히 말을 듣기 시작했다.
description.spanish: Captaste el ritmo, y la sala comenzó a obedecer tus órdenes
description.brazilian: Você pegou o ritmo, e o quarto começou a obedecer

description.english: You turned every space into a stage for design
description.schinese: 你能将任何空间化作设计的舞台
description.japanese: どんな空間も、デザインのステージに変えられる
description.tchinese: 你能將任何空間化作設計的舞台
description.german: Du kannst jeden Raum in eine Bühne für dein Design verwandeln.
description.french: Chaque espace devient scène de création.
description.koreana: 어떤 공간이든 디자인의 무대로 만들 수 있게 되었다.
description.spanish: Convertiste cada espacio en un escenario para el diseño
description.brazilian: Você transformou qualquer espaço em um palco de design

description.english: You made housekeeping into an art
description.schinese: 你的家政成为了一种艺术
description.japanese: 家事が、ひとつの芸術になった
description.tchinese: 你的家政成為了一種藝術
description.german: Du hast Hausarbeit zur Kunst gemacht.
description.french: La maison respire l’art sous tes mains.
description.koreana: 나의 가사 관리는 하나의 예술이 되었다.
description.spanish: Convertiste las tareas domésticas en un arte
description.brazilian: A organização virou arte em suas mãos

description.english: You squeezed the duck
description.schinese: 你捏了捏鸭子
description.japanese: アヒルちゃんをぎゅっと握った
description.tchinese: 你捏了捏鴨子
description.german: Du hast die Ente gequetscht.
description.french: Tu presses le canard.
description.koreana: 오리를 꼬집었다.
description.spanish: Apretaste el patito
description.brazilian: Você apertou o patinho

description.english: You spotted stubborn stains in her new home
description.schinese: 你在新家发现了顽固的污渍
description.japanese: 新しい家で、頑固な汚れを見つけた
description.tchinese: 你在新家發現了頑固的汙漬
description.german: Du hast in dem neuen Zuhause hartnäckige Flecken entdeckt.
description.french: Des taches rebelles apparaissent dans la nouvelle maison.
description.koreana: 새 집에서 지워지지 않는 얼룩을 발견했다.
description.spanish: Descubriste manchas difíciles de limpiar en la nueva casa
description.brazilian: Você encontrou manchas teimosas na casa nova dela

description.english: You found a place no one had been before
description.schinese: 你找到了一个没人来过的地方
description.japanese: 誰も訪れたことのない場所を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一個沒人來過的地方
description.german: Du hast einen Ort gefunden, an dem noch nie jemand war.
description.french: Un lieu jamais visité est découvert.
description.koreana: 아무도 오지 않은 곳을 찾아냈다.
description.spanish: Encontraste un lugar donde nadie había estado
description.brazilian: Você descobriu um lugar onde ninguém jamais esteve

description.english: You used magic to make it snow
description.schinese: 你用魔法降下了一场雪
description.japanese: 魔法で、雪を降らせた
description.tchinese: 你用魔法降下了一場雪
description.german: Du hast mit Magie einen Schneesturm herbeigerufen.
description.french: La neige tombe sous ta magie.
description.koreana: 마법으로 눈을 내리게 했다.
description.spanish: Usaste magia para hacer nevar
description.brazilian: Você usou magia para fazer nevar

description.english: You struck your first bass note
description.schinese: 你弹响了第一声低音
description.japanese: 最初の低音を奏でた
description.tchinese: 你彈響了第一聲低音
description.german: Du hast deine erste Bassnote getroffen!
description.french: Tu joues ta première note de basse.
description.koreana: 첫 번째 저음을 연주했다.
description.spanish: Tocaste la primera nota de bajo
description.brazilian: Você tocou a primeira nota grave

description.english: You tried to open the locked freezer
description.schinese: 你试图打开紧闭的冰柜
description.japanese: ぎっしり閉まった冷凍庫を開けようとした
description.tchinese: 你試圖打開緊閉的冰櫃
description.german: Du hast versucht, den verschlossenen Gefrierschrank zu öffnen.
description.french: Tu tentes d’ouvrir le congélateur verrouillé.
description.koreana: 단단히 닫힌 냉동고를 열려고 시도했다.
description.spanish: Abriste el congelador cerrado
description.brazilian: Você tentou abrir o freezer trancado

description.english: You found a cat in a towel
description.schinese: 你发现毛巾里长出了一只猫
description.japanese: タオルの中から、猫が一匹生えているのを発見した
description.tchinese: 你發現毛巾裡長出了一隻貓
description.german: Du hast eine Katze in einem Handtuch gefunden.
description.french: Une chatte se cache dans la serviette.
description.koreana: 수건 속에서 고양이 한 마리가 나온 것을 발견했다.
description.spanish: Encontraste un gato en la toalla
description.brazilian: Você encontrou um gato dentro da toalha

description.english: You made sweet, chilly ice cream
description.schinese: 你制作了清凉又甜蜜的冰激凌
description.japanese: ひんやり甘いアイスクリームを作り上げた
description.tchinese: 你製作了清涼又甜蜜的冰淇淋
description.german: Du hast süßes, kühles Eis gemacht.
description.french: Tu crées une glace douce et fraîche.
description.koreana: 시원하고 달콤한 아이스크림을 만들었다.
description.spanish: Hiciste un helado dulce y refrescante
description.brazilian: Você fez um sorvete doce e refrescante

description.english: You made the skeleton sigh with comfort
description.schinese: 你让骷髅发出了舒适的呜呜声
description.japanese: ドクロが心地よい「ウー」という声を出した
description.tchinese: 你讓骷髏發出了舒適的嗚嗚聲
description.german: Du hast dem Skelett ein gemütliches Wimmern entlockt.
description.french: Tu fais soupirer le squelette de confort.
description.koreana: 해골이 편안한 '우우' 소리를 냈다.
description.spanish: Hiciste que el esqueleto emitiera un sonido de satisfacción
description.brazilian: Você fez o esqueleto soltar um suspiro confortável

description.english: You discovered the secret of burnt bread
description.schinese: 你发现了烤焦面包的秘密
description.japanese: 焦げたパンの秘密を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現了烤焦麵包的秘密
description.german: Du hast das Geheimnis von angebranntem Brot entdeckt.
description.french: Tu découvres le secret du pain brûlé.
description.koreana: 타버린 빵의 비밀을 발견했다.
description.spanish: Descubriste el secreto del pan quemado
description.brazilian: Você descobriu o segredo do pão queimado

description.english: You watched the tree dancing in the sun
description.schinese: 你看见那棵树在阳光里舞蹈
description.japanese: あの木が日差しの中で踊っているのを見た
description.tchinese: 你看見那棵樹在陽光裡舞蹈
description.german: Du hast zugesehen, wie der Baum in der Sonne getanzt ist.
description.french: Tu observes l’arbre danser sous les rayons.
description.koreana: 나무가 햇살 속에서 춤추는 것을 보았다.
description.spanish: Viste el árbol bailando bajo el sol
description.brazilian: Você viu a árvore dançar sob a luz do sol

description.english: You helped the broom find a new pose
description.schinese: 你让扫把找到了新的姿态
description.japanese: ほうきに新たな姿を見出させた
description.tchinese: 你讓掃把找到了新的姿態
description.german: Du hast dem Besen geholfen, eine neue Pose zu finden.
description.french: Le balai prend vie sous tes sorts.
description.koreana: 빗자루가 새로운 자세를 찾게 했다.
description.spanish: Ayudaste a la escoba a encontrar una nueva postura
description.brazilian: Você deu à vassoura uma nova forma de existir

description.english: You sparked a little party
description.schinese: 你点燃了一场小型派对
description.japanese: 小さなパーティーに火をつけた
description.tchinese: 你點燃了一場小型派對
description.german: Du hast eine kleine Party losgetreten.
description.french: Une mini-party s’illumine grâce à toi.
description.koreana: 조그마한 파티를 불태웠다.
description.spanish: Encendiste una pequeña fiesta
description.brazilian: Você acendeu uma pequena festa

description.english: You looked more shocked than him
description.schinese: 你看起来比他更惊讶
description.japanese: 彼より自分の方が驚いているように見える
description.tchinese: 你看起來比他更驚訝
description.german: Du sahst noch schockierter aus als er.
description.french: Ton étonnement dépasse le sien.
description.koreana: 내가 그보다 더 놀란 것 같았다.
description.spanish: Te viste más sorprendido que él
description.brazilian: Você parecia mais surpreso do que ele

description.english: You knew someone was holding on to the world
description.schinese: 你知道有人正努力维系着与世界的联系
description.japanese: 誰かが世界とのつながりを、必死に保とうとしていることを知った
description.tchinese: 你知道有人正努力維繫著與世界的聯繫
description.german: Du wusstest, dass jemand hart daran arbeitet, die Verbindung zur Welt aufrechtzuerhalten.
description.french: Quelqu’un garde un lien avec le monde, et tu le sais.
description.koreana: 누군가가 세상과의 연결을 필사적으로 유지하고 있음을 알았다.
description.spanish: Sabes que alguien se aferra al otro mundo
description.brazilian: Você percebeu que alguém estava se esforçando para permanecer ligado ao mundo

description.english: You couldn’t grasp the folding geometry
description.schinese: 你理解不了那几何展开又折叠
description.japanese: あの幾何学が展開しては折りたたまれる様子は理解できない
description.tchinese: 你理解不了那幾何展開又折疊
description.german: Du konntest die Faltgeometrie nicht begreifen.
description.french: Tu n’arrives pas à saisir cette géométrie qui se déplie et se replie.
description.koreana: 이 기하학적 전개와 접힘을 이해할 수 없었다.
description.spanish: No podías comprender la geometría que se doblaba y desplegaba
description.brazilian: Você não conseguiu entender aquelas formas geométricas que se dobravam e se abriam

description.english: You opened an old time capsule
description.schinese: 你打开了旧日的时光胶囊
description.japanese: 過去のタイムカプセルを開けた
description.tchinese: 你打開了舊日的時光膠囊
description.german: Du hast eine alte Zeitkapsel geöffnet.
description.french: Tu ouvres une capsule temporelle d’antan.
description.koreana: 오래된 타임캡슐을 열었다.
description.spanish: Abriste una cápsula del tiempo
description.brazilian: Você abriu a cápsula do tempo do passado

displayName.japanese: シュレーディンガーの木

description.english: You found a tree both dead and alive
description.schinese: 你发现一棵又死又活的树
description.japanese: 死んでいるのか生きているのか分からない木を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現一棵又死又活的樹
description.german: Du hast einen Baum gefunden, der sowohl tot als auch lebendig ist.
description.french: Tu découvres un arbre à la fois mort et vivant.
description.koreana: 죽어있으면서도 살아있는 나무를 발견했다.
description.spanish: Encontraste un árbol que está a la vez muerto y vivo
description.brazilian: Você encontrou uma árvore ao mesmo tempo viva e morta

description.english: You got on the bus and began a journey
description.schinese: 你登上公交车，开启一段未知旅程
description.japanese: バスに乗り込み、未知の旅を始めた
description.tchinese: 你登上公車，開啟一段未知旅程
description.german: Du bist in den Bus gestiegen und hast deine Reise angetreten.
description.french: Tu embarques pour un voyage inconnu.
description.koreana: 버스에 올라 미지의 여정을 시작했다.
description.spanish: Subiste al autobús y comenzaste un viaje lleno de incertidumbre
description.brazilian: Você subiu no ônibus e iniciou uma jornada desconhecida

description.english: You saw the lonely lamp still shining
description.schinese: 你看见那盏孤单的灯依旧亮着
description.japanese: あの孤独な灯りが、まだ光っているのを見た
description.tchinese: 你看見那盞孤單的燈依舊亮著
description.german: Du hast gesehen, dass die einsame Lampe immer noch leuchtet.
description.french: La lampe solitaire continue de briller.
description.koreana: 그 외로운 등불이 여전히 켜져 있는 것을 보았다.
description.spanish: Viste que la lámpara solitaria seguía brillando
description.brazilian: Você viu a lâmpada solitária ainda acesa

description.english: You uncovered a gravestone caught between being and not
description.schinese: 你发现了那块介于存在于不存在之间的墓碑
description.japanese: 存在とも非存在ともつかない墓碑を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現了那塊介於存在與不存在之間的墓碑
description.german: Du hast einen Grabstein entdeckt, der irgendwo zwischen Sein und Nichtsein steckt.
description.french: Une pierre tombale suspendue entre l’être et le néant.
description.koreana: 존재와 비존재 사이에 있는 그 묘비를 발견했다.
description.spanish: Descubriste una lápida situada entre el ser y el no ser
description.brazilian: Você descobriu uma lápide suspensa entre existir e não existir

description.english: You wondered if time had looped
description.schinese: 你怀疑时间是否绕了个圈
description.japanese: 時間がぐるりと回ったのではないかと疑った
description.tchinese: 你懷疑時間是否繞了個圈
description.german: Du hast dich gefragt, ob die Zeit sich in einer Schleife wiederholt.
description.french: Tu te demandes si le temps a fait un cercle.
description.koreana: 시간이 원을 돌아 제자리에 온 것은 아닌지 의심했다.
description.spanish: Te preguntaste si el tiempo había dado una vuelta
description.brazilian: Você começou a suspeitar que o tempo havia dado uma volta

description.english: You spotted his secret note made from newspaper scraps
description.schinese: 你看到了他用报纸拼出的神秘留言
description.japanese: 彼が新聞紙で作った神秘メッセージを見た
description.tchinese: 你看到了他用報紙拼出的神秘留言
description.german: Du hast seine geheime Notiz aus Zeitungsfetzen entdeckt.
description.french: Tu vois le message secret créé avec des journaux.
description.koreana: 그가 신문으로 만든 신비로운 메시지를 보았다.
description.spanish: Viste su mensaje secreto hecho de recortes de periódico
description.brazilian: Você viu a mensagem misteriosa formada com recortes de jornal

description.english: You lit incense and revealed hidden art
description.schinese: 你点上香，让画布显现出隐藏的图案
description.japanese: 線香を焚くと、キャンバスに隠された模様が浮かび上がった
description.tchinese: 你點上香，讓畫布顯現出隱藏的圖案
description.german: Du hast Räucherstäbchen angezündet und verborgene Kunst enthüllt.
description.french: L’encens révèle un motif caché sur la toile.
description.koreana: 향을 피우자, 캔버스에 숨겨진 그림이 드러나게 했다.
description.spanish: Encendiste incienso para revelar un arte oculto en el lienzo
description.brazilian: Você acendeu o incenso e revelou o desenho oculto na tela

description.english: You held the brush and made a masterpiece in a stroke
description.schinese: 你握住笔，随手一挥便是一幅佳作
description.japanese: ペンを握り、さっと一振りで見事な作品が生まれた
description.tchinese: 你握住筆，隨手一揮便是一幅佳作
description.german: Du greifest zum Stift und schon ist ein tolles Kunstwerk fertig – einfach so.
description.french: Une simple touche devient chef-d’œuvre sous ton pinceau.
description.koreana: 펜을 잡고 쓱 한 번 휘두르자 바로 명작이 되었다.
description.spanish: Creaste una obra maestra de un solo trazo al azar
description.brazilian: Você segurou o pincel e, com um gesto, criou uma obra-prima

description.english: You restored someone’s colors
description.schinese: 你让一个人恢复了色彩
description.japanese: ある人に、色彩を取り戻させた。
description.tchinese: 你讓一個人恢復了色彩
description.german: Du hast jemandem die Farben zurückgebracht.
description.french: Une personne reprend ses teintes grâce à toi.
description.koreana: 한 사람에게 색을 되찾아 주었다.
description.spanish: Le devolviste los colores a una persona
description.brazilian: Você devolveu as cores a alguém

description.english: You fixed the road
description.schinese: 你修好了路面
description.japanese: 道路を修復した
description.tchinese: 你修好了路面
description.german: Du hast die Straße repariert.
description.french: Tu répares la route.
description.koreana: 도로를 수리했다.
description.spanish: Arreglaste el camino
description.brazilian: Você consertou a estrada

description.english: You picked up a phone with no number
description.schinese: 你拿起了没有任何号码的电话
description.japanese: 何の番号も書かれていない電話を手に取った
description.tchinese: 你拿起了沒有任何號碼的電話
description.german: Du hast ein Handy ohne Nummer aufgehoben.
description.french: Tu décroches un téléphone sans numéro.
description.koreana: 아무 번호도 없는 전화를 받았다.
description.spanish: Contestaste una llamada sin número
description.brazilian: Você atendeu um telefone sem número algum

displayName.japanese: レインボーキャンディ

description.english: You walked through colorful rain
description.schinese: 你淋到了彩色的雨
description.japanese: カラフルな雨に濡れた
description.tchinese: 你淋到了彩色的雨
description.german: Du bist in den bunten Regen geraten.
description.french: Tu marches sous une pluie colorée.
description.koreana: 알록달록한 비를 맞았다.
description.spanish: Caminaste bajo la lluvia colorida
description.brazilian: Você caminhou sob uma chuva colorida

description.english: You received a heart from the well
description.schinese: 你收到了水井里递来的爱心
description.japanese: 井戸から届けられたハートを受け取った
description.tchinese: 你收到了水井裡遞來的愛心
description.german: Du hast ein Herz aus dem Brunnen bekommen.
description.french: La fontaine t’offre son affection.
description.koreana: 우물에서 건네진 하트를 받았다.
description.spanish: Recibiste un corazoncito del pozo
description.brazilian: Você recebeu um coração vindo do fundo do poço

description.english: You noticed something odd about the giraffe
description.schinese: 你注意到了长颈鹿的不同寻常
description.japanese: キリンのおかしいところに気づいた
description.tchinese: 你注意到了長頸鹿的不同尋常
description.german: Dir ist was Seltsames an der Giraffe aufgefallen.
description.french: Tu as remarqué quelque chose d’étrange chez la girafe.
description.koreana: 기린의 수상한 점을 알아차렸다.
description.spanish: Notaste lo extraño de la jirafa
description.brazilian: Você percebeu algo estranho naquela girafa

description.english: You stand before the massive crane, fearless.
description.schinese: 你面对巨大的塔吊，毫不畏惧
description.japanese: 工事現場の小さなドアを見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一個工地的小門
description.german: Du hast dem riesigen Kran ohne Angst gegenübergestanden.
description.french: Tu fais face à la grue géante sans peur.
description.koreana: 거대한 타워 크레인을 보고도 전혀 두려워하지 않았다.
description.spanish: Te enfrentaste a la grúa gigante sin miedo
description.brazilian: Diante do enorme guindaste, você não sentiu medo

description.english: You finished the task for her
description.schinese: 你替她做完了那件事
description.japanese: 彼女の代わりに、あの小さな用事を済ませた
description.tchinese: 你替她做完了那件小事
description.german: Du hast die Sache für sie erledigt.
description.french: Tu as accompli la tâche pour elle.
description.koreana: 그녀를 대신하여 그 일을 끝마쳤다.
description.spanish: Terminaste la tarea por ella
description.brazilian: Você concluiu a tarefa no lugar dela

description.english: You pried up the stubborn floorboard
description.schinese: 你把那块不肯松动的床板拆了下来
description.japanese: どうしても外れなかったベッド板を取り外した
description.tchinese: 你把那塊不肯鬆動的床板拆了下來
description.german: Du hast die hartnäckige Bodenplatte aufgehebelt.
description.french: La planche résistante a cédé sous tes mains.
description.koreana: 움직이지 않으려던 그 침대 판을 떼어냈다.
description.spanish: Desmontaste la tabla de la cama que no se quería aflojar
description.brazilian: Você arrancou a tábua do piso que se recusava a ceder

description.english: You grew a flower taller than all others
description.schinese: 你种出了一朵格外高大的花
description.japanese: ひときわ大きな花を育てた
description.tchinese: 你種出了一朵格外高大的花
description.german: Du hast eine besonders große Blume gezüchtet.
description.french: Tu as fait pousser une fleur plus grande que toutes les autres.
description.koreana: 유난히 키가 큰 꽃 한 송이를 키워냈다.
description.spanish: Cultivaste una flor más alta que todas las demás
description.brazilian: Você cultivou uma flor mais alta do que todas as outras

description.english: You found the lamp from your childhood dream
description.schinese: 你找到了小时候梦里的那盏灯
description.japanese: 子供の頃、夢に出てきたあの灯りを見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了小時候夢裡的那盞燈
description.german: Du hast die Lampe aus deinem Kindheitstraum gefunden.
description.french: Tu retrouves la lampe de tes rêves d’enfance.
description.koreana: 어릴 적 꿈에서 보았던 그 등불을 찾아냈다.
description.spanish: Encontraste la lámpara de los sueños infantiles
description.brazilian: Você encontrou a lâmpada dos sonhos da infância

displayName.japanese: でたらめに塗りたくる

description.english: You scribbled wildly in the doodle book
description.schinese: 你在涂鸦本上乱涂乱画
description.japanese: 落書き帳に好き勝手に描きなぐった
description.tchinese: 你在塗鴉本上亂塗亂畫
description.german: Du hast wild im Kritzelbuch gekritzelt.
description.french: Tu as dessiné n’importe quoi dans le carnet.
description.koreana: 낙서장에 마구 덧칠했다.
description.spanish: Garabateaste en el cuaderno de dibujos
description.brazilian: Você rabiscou livremente no caderno de desenhos

description.english: You built a new shelf from old planks
description.schinese: 你用旧木板拼了一个新架子
description.japanese: 古い木板で新しい棚を組み立てた
description.tchinese: 你用舊木板拼了一個新架子
description.german: Du hast ein neues Regal aus alten Brettern gebaut.
description.french: Tu as fabriqué une étagère avec des planches anciennes.
description.koreana: 헌 나무판으로 새 선반을 만들었다.
description.spanish: Hiciste un nuevo estante con tablones viejos
description.brazilian: Você montou uma nova estante com tábuas antigas

description.english: You swung the hammer and nailed the mole
description.schinese: 你挥下的锤子正好砸中了冒头的地鼠
description.japanese: 振り下ろしたハンマーが、顔を出したモグラにちょうど当たった
description.tchinese: 你揮下的錘子正好砸中了冒頭的地鼠
description.german: Du hast mit dem Hammer geschwungen und den Maulwurf festgenagelt.
description.french: Ton marteau a touché la taupe pile au bon endroit.
description.koreana: 휘두른 망치가 딱 튀어나온 두더지를 맞혔다.
description.spanish: Levantaste el martillo y le diste un golpe justo al topo asomado
description.brazilian: Você desferiu o martelo no momento exato e acertou o rato-toupeira

description.english: You spotted a basketball at 4 a.m.
description.schinese: 你看见了凌晨四点的篮球
description.japanese: 深夜4時のバスケットボールを見た
description.tchinese: 你看見了凌晨四點的籃球
description.german: Du hast um 4 Uhr morgens einen Basketball entdeckt.
description.french: Tu aperçois un ballon à quatre heures.
description.koreana: 새벽 네 시의 농구공을 보았다.
description.spanish: Viste un baloncesto a las 4 de la mañana
description.brazilian: Você viu uma bola de basquete às 4 da manhã

description.english: You learned no one can resist a meow
description.schinese: 你发现没有人能抵抗喵喵
description.japanese: 誰も「ニャーニャー」に抗えないことと悟った
description.tchinese: 你發現沒有人能抵抗喵喵
description.german: Du hast gelernt, dass niemand einem Miauen widerstehen kann.
description.french: Personne ne résiste à un miaulement.
description.koreana: 아무도 야옹거림을 저항할 수 없다는 것을 발견했다.
description.spanish: Aprendiste que nadie puede resistirse a un gatito
description.brazilian: Você descobriu que ninguém resiste a um miado

description.english: You met a Taoist priest
description.schinese: 你遇见了一个道士
description.japanese: 道士に出会った
description.tchinese: 你遇見了一個道士
description.german: Du bist einem taoistischen Priester begegnet.
description.french: Tu rencontres un prêtre taoïste.
description.koreana: 도사 한 명을 만났다.
description.spanish: Conociste a un sacerdote taoísta
description.brazilian: Você conheceu um sacerdote taoísta

description.english: You discovered the first fridge that can be opened
description.schinese: 你发现了第一台能真正打开的冰箱
description.japanese: 初めて、本当に開けられる冷蔵庫を発見した
description.tchinese: 你發現了第一台能真正打開的冰箱
description.german: Du hast den ersten Kühlschrank gefunden, der sich wirklich öffnen lässt!
description.french: Tu découvres le premier frigo qui s’ouvre vraiment.
description.koreana: 진짜로 열리는 첫 번째 냉장고를 발견했다.
description.spanish: Descubriste la primera nevera que se puede abrir de verdad
description.brazilian: Você encontrou a primeira geladeira que realmente podia ser aberta

description.english: You saw the statue sneak a move
description.schinese: 你发现雕塑偷偷动了一下
description.japanese: 彫刻がこっそり動いたのを発見した
description.tchinese: 你發現雕塑偷偷動了一下
description.german: Du bemerkst, dass die Skulptur sich heimlich bewegt hat.
description.french: Une sculpture s’anime sous tes yeux.
description.koreana: 조각상이 몰래 움직인 것을 발견했다.
description.spanish: Te diste cuenta de que la escultura se movió furtivamente
description.brazilian: Você percebeu a escultura se mover discretamente

description.english: You spotted a dozing stone lion
description.schinese: 你发现了一尊打盹的石狮子
description.japanese: 居眠りしている石獅子を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你發現了一尊打盹的石獅子
description.german: Du hast einen schlafenden Steinlöwen entdeckt.
description.french: Tu aperçois un lion de pierre somnolent.
description.koreana: 꾸벅꾸벅 조는 돌사자상을 발견했다.
description.spanish: Encontraste a un león de piedra dormitando
description.brazilian: Você encontrou um leão de pedra cochilando

description.english: You lit the lighthouse, and lost ships found their way
description.schinese: 你点亮了灯塔，迷途的船找到了方向
description.japanese: 灯台を灯すと、迷っていた船が進む方向を見出した
description.tchinese: 你點亮了燈塔，迷途的船找到了方向
description.german: Du hast den Leuchtturm angezündet, und verlorene Schiffe haben ihren Weg gefunden.
description.french: Tu allumes le phare et les bateaux perdus retrouvent le chemin.
description.koreana: 등대를 밝히자, 길 잃은 배가 방향을 찾았다.
description.spanish: Encendiste el faro, y los barcos perdidos encontraron su rumbo
description.brazilian: Você acendeu o farol, e os navios perdidos encontraram o caminho

description.english: You sent a ship to chase new stories
description.schinese: 你派了一艘船，出去寻找新的故事
description.japanese: 船を一隻送り、新たな物語を探しに出かけた
description.tchinese: 你派了一艘船，出去尋找新的故事
description.german: Du hast ein Schiff losgeschickt, um neue Geschichten zu finden.
description.french: Tu envoies un navire explorer de nouvelles histoires.
description.koreana: 새로운 이야기를 찾아 배 한 척을 내보냈다.
description.spanish: Enviaste un barco en busca de nuevas historias
description.brazilian: Você enviou um navio para buscar novas histórias

description.english: You found a really narrow alley
description.schinese: 你找到了一条真的很窄的巷子
description.japanese: 本当に狭い路地を見つけた
description.tchinese: 你找到了一條真的很窄的小巷
description.german: Du hast eine richtig enge Gasse gefunden.
description.french: Tu découvres une ruelle vraiment étroite.
description.koreana: 정말 좁은 골목길 하나를 찾아냈다.
description.spanish: Encontraste un callejón muy estrecho
description.brazilian: Você encontrou um beco realmente estreito

description.english: You fixed the fire hydrant on the way
description.schinese: 你顺手修好了消防栓
description.japanese: ついでに消火栓を直した
description.tchinese: 你順手修好了消防栓
description.german: Du hast den Hydranten ganz nebenbei repariert.
description.french: Tu répares le poteau incendie en passant.
description.koreana: 겸사겸사 소화전을 수리했다.
description.spanish: Reparaste el hidrante de incendios de paso
description.brazilian: Você consertou o hidrante no caminho
